quest.name: A Gift from House Leveilleur
journal: Meryld's ever-watchful gaze is upon you, with a smile uncomfortably reminiscent of Tataru writ across her face.
objectives: Speak with the House Leveilleur maidservant.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: MadamMaster Surname, it is a pleasant surprise to see you. As ever, your timing is impeccable.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: Lady Ameliance has entrusted me with a gift for you─a set of attire she hoped would be to your liking.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: Before relinquishing the clothing to you, I thought it prudent to make sure they are a proper fit. I am terribly sorry for the inconvenience, but may I trouble you to speak with the maidservant yonder?

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: The gift is, of course, a token of Lady Ameliance's appreciation for your deeds─but I should hope you will accept it as a sign of thanks from we servants as well.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: And if I may say one more thing...please continue to look after Master Alphinaud and Lady Alisaie.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: Please seek out the maidservant for any necessary adjustments to the clothing when you have a moment.

dialogue.name: HOUSEMAID04524
dialogue.text: Greetings, MadamMaster Surname. I have your attire here.

dialogue.name: HOUSEMAID04524
dialogue.text: Lady Ameliance has a sharp eye for measurements, but please allow me to confirm no other adjustments are needed.

dialogue.name: HOUSEMAID04524
dialogue.text: Hmmm...yes, the shoulders should fit nicely...and the length of the sleeves should not prove to be an issue either.

dialogue.name: HOUSEMAID04524
dialogue.text: With that, I believe I have taken up quite enough of your time. On behalf of all the staff here at House Leveilleur, I wish you safe travels!
